EmailTemplate.description: Message about NEW BANT Fields sent in error.
EmailTemplate.name: PLEASE IGNORE Previous Message About New Opportunity BANT Fields
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Change: Opportunity BANT Fields
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Salesforce Users!
Please ignore the previous message regarding the addition of new BANT fields to the Opportunity pages that was sent in error. More information will be communicated to the teams by Rev Ops leadership.
Stay tuned!
If you have any questions, please reach out to Rosalyn Santa Elena at rosalyn.santaelena@neo4j.com
Thank you, Salesforce Team
